entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. High 19. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
